q_en: What are the top three products made in all orders in total?

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, SUM(op.number) as total_quantity FROM order_product op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of each product made in all orders

steps.sql: SELECT pt.description, p.attributes FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (7, 15, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the product type description and attributes for the top three products

response:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the top three products made in all orders. Here's a neat table for you:

| Product ID | Description | Attributes     | Total Quantity |
|------------|-------------|----------------|----------------|
| 7          | Skirt       | Purple, M size | 540            |
| 15         | Skirt       | Pink, M size   | 345            |
| 27         | T-shirt     | Yellow, S size | 260            |
